ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: +2: 从你的牌库将一张蓝色咒语加入手牌，然后将你的牌库洗牌
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filter = ClearFilter() local effectController = EffectController() filter:Add( FE_COLOUR, OP_IS, COLOUR_BLUE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_LIBRARY, effectController ) effectController:SetItemCount( 1 ) for i = 0, (1-1) do effectController:SetItemPrompt(i, "CARD_QUERY_CHOOSE_SPELL_TO_HAND" ) end effectController:ChooseItems( EffectDC():Make_Targets(0) )
local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:PutInHand( EffectController() ) end EffectController():ShuffleLibrary()
